name: getDrawingTransform(_:rect:rotate:preserveAspectRatio:)
desc: Returns the affine transform that maps a box to a given rectangle on a PDF page.
declaration:
func getDrawingTransform(_ box: CGPDFBox, 
                    rect: CGRect, 
                  rotate: Int32, 
     preserveAspectRatio: Bool) -> CGAffineTransform
